author: BizSlate Inc.
title: BizSlate CEO to Discuss Managing Growth in an Omni-Channel
text:
NEW YORK , Oct. 6,   BizSlate Inc., ( http://bizslate.com/ ) named one of the most promising ERP solutions by CIOReview Magazine , today announced that its CEO and founder, Marc Kalman , will be speaking at the 2015 NEECOM conference on the subject of "Managing Growth in an Omni-Channel World " on Sunday, Oct. 18 . Mr. Kalman's session, coming off of his success with his new startup, BizSlate, will explore a new perspective in managing critical inventory, order management, and other supply operations which are often the source of inefficiency and constraint on business growth.
Mr. Kalman is an experienced business leader, published author and recognized supply chain expert. He has been named a top supply-chain professional by Supply and Demand Chain Executive for the past seven consecutive years. Mr. Kalman has two decades of experience helping thousands of SMBs significantly improve supply chains and operations. Mr. Kalman has spoken at the Red Herring North America and DEMO spring conventions, and has been published in Supply & Demand Chain Executive Magazine.
About BizSlate
BizSlate's award-winning, cloud-based supply chain software enables small- and mid-sized manufacturing and distribution businesses to compete more effectively, reduce operational costs, and gain greater visibility into their supply chain. Unlike most  ERP and order management software that are accounting-focused, BizSlate's solution  is designed  from the supply chain process inward. The result is a revolutionary approach that provides proprietary capabilities to solve real-world supply chain challenges. BizSlate is easy and inexpensive to implement, easy to learn and use, and offers growing businesses tremendous, cost-effective operational improvements. For more information, please go to www.bizslate.com .
